text: A map of Brazos Island, showing that the island's landmass is not always completely surrounded by water. Brazos Island, also known as Brazos Santiago Island, is a barrier island on the Gulf Coast of Texas in the United States, south of the town of South Padre Island. The island is located in Cameron County. ==References== * * * "A Decade of Beneficial Use, Brazos Island Harbor, Dredging" by T. Neil McLellan, P.E., Herbie Maurer, P.E., Bob Fudge, P.E., and Dan J. Heilman, P.E. * A description of the Expedition from Brazos Santiago ==External links== * Category:Barrier islands of Texas Category:Landforms of Cameron County, Texas Category:State parks of Texas Category:Uninhabited islands of the United States
title: Brazos Island
